item.title: CVE-2022-46797|2024-08-03T14:39:38.622Z -- conversios -- all-in-one%20google%20analytics%2C%20pixels%20and%20product%20feed%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Conversios All-in-one Google Analytics, Pixels and Product Feed Manager for WooCommerce plugin <=Â 5.2.3 leads to plugin settings change.

item.title: CVE-2024-29794|2024-06-04T17:57:39.826Z -- conversios -- conversios.io
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Conversios Conversios.Io allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Conversios.Io: from n/a through 6.9.1.
